title: Garen!
body: Vegul mi lessz frissitik garent vangy nem ? mer mar mutatyak egy par hete h frissitik az E kepesseget de nm tesznek be semmit

replies.body:
[Changelist: 1 / 2 / 3 - Back for more testing this cycle!]
Base HP lowered from 616.28 to 615
HP per level increased from 84.25 to 85
Base MR lowered from 32.1 to 32
Attack speed per level increased from 2.9% to 3%
Perseverance (Passive)
[Removed] No longer doubles below (25/50%) health
Cooldown changed from 9/4 to 6 at all ranks
Changed from  [non-epic monsters don't break passive at level 11] to [non-epic monsters never break it]
Heal amount changed from [2%/8%] to [1.5/1.7/1.9/2.1/2.3/2.5/3.4/4.3/5.2/6.1/7/7.9/8.8/9.2/9.6/10/10.4/10.8%] 

Courage (W) 
Resists per stack lowered from .33 to .25
Resists cap lowered from 50 to 30
Minion kills to max stacks increased from 150 to 160
[New] Gains a shield that block [12% health] damage
60% tenacity now lasts as long as shield holds
[Removed] No longer takes 60% less damage for the first .75 seconds

Judgment (E)
Tick changed from [5+1 per 3 levels (max 10)] to [7+1 per 15% attack speed]
Base damage changed from 14/18/22/26/30 to 9/15/21/27/33
AD ratio changed from .36/.37/.38/.39/.4 to .28/.31/.34/.37/.40
Hits needed to shred armor increased from 4 to 6
[Removed] No longer deals 33% bonus damage if hitting only one enemy
[New] now deals 3/5/7/9/11 (+9-13.5% AD)  bonus damage if there is only one enemy in range

Demacian Justice (R)
[Removed] the Villainy passive
Changed from [deals magic damage] to [always deals True Damage]
Damage changed from [175/350/525 (+28.6/33.3/40% of missing HP)] to [150/300/450 (+20/25/30% of missing HP)]

Még mindig tesztelik,ami nem a közeljövőben lesz elérhető .
Amennyire tudom visszavonták, de legalábbis polcolták a változtatásokat.
